Typical of the local occupiers were four young men - including a former furniture designer , and an IT specialist - we found hunched over laptops in an office , working on the website for the self - proclaimed People 's Republic of Donetsk .
That 's the entity that since the May 11 independence referendum claims to represent the people here .
